Ocasio: Cortez's response to criticism: Ocasio-Cortez reacted to the criticism by stating that it was a "classic Republican strategy" and called it "sad." She did not explicitly call Republicans "stupid."
Republican strategy: Ocasio-Cortez mentioned that the Republican strategy was to "act stupid" but did not directly label them as "stupid."
